abstract: Facebook will unveil Telecom Infra Project at Mobile World Congress; organization, established with several telecommunications service providers and gear makers, will collaborate on creating new technologies, especially those pertaining to high-speed wireless data.

headline.print_headline: Facebook  Taps Crowd  to Innovate  in Wireless

snippet: The social networking giant wants virtual reality everywhere. That means getting hardware costs down.
lead_paragraph: The social networking giant wants virtual reality everywhere. That means getting hardware costs down.
